input.sentences: we had dinner at a friend 's house a few weeks ago .
this is her with one of my daughters .
they love visiting each other as often as we can .
one of my daughters drew this picture for her and put it on the table .
we took a few more pictures like this one before going home .
output.sentences: I had prepared for wees to visit the new house of my friend.
My daughter loved her so much.
Visiting her was just amazing because I love her so much.
SHeset the dinner table and included pictures that the girls drew on while we had a nice talk.
AFter that, the girl expected these pictures at home as well!
